block.p: BOSTON RED SOX--Announced RHP Pedro Martinez withdrew the appeal of his five-game suspension. TEXAS RANGERS--Purchased the contract of OF Scarborough Green from Oklahoma of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned SS Kelly Dransfeldt to Oklahoma. Designated C Cesar King of Oklahoma for assignment.

BOSTON RED SOX--Announced RHP Pedro Martinez withdrew the appeal of his five-game suspension. TEXAS RANGERS--Purchased the contract of OF Scarborough Green from Oklahoma of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned SS Kelly Dransfeldt to Oklahoma. Designated C Cesar King of Oklahoma for assignment.

ATLANTA BRAVES--Placed OF Reggie Sanders on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of INF Steve Sisco from Richmond of the International League. CINCINNATI REDS--Placed RHP Pete Harnisch on the 15-day disabled list. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed OF Geoff Jenkins on the 15-day disabled.
NORTHERN LEAGUE WATERBURY SPIRIT--Signed LHP Matt Dunbar.

SOUTH ATLANTIC LEAGUE MACON BRAVES--Announced RHP Daniel Curtis has been promoted to Myrtle Beach of the Carolina League and INF Louis Martinez has been promoted to Richmond of the International League. Acquired RHP Brett Evert from the Atlanta Braves' extended spring training.
ATLANTIC LEAGUE ATLANTIC CITY SURF--Signed RHP-C Sam Ali.
Women's National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES SPARKS--Signed G Kristin Clark.
